name: Northern Warrior
description: An unfinished game made for the Community Game Jam 2019, trying to follow the theme of "The game is a Liar." The game is still unfinished and very unpolished, as well as very buggy. I intend to fix the game and release a finished, polished, and (hopefully) bug free. If you do play, thank you for playing, and sorry about this mess of a game.
